title: Post-Pandemic Digital Humanization Language Education Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Strengthening language education design competencies for current practitioners using smartphone-based VR simulation environments

learning_goals: Participants can explain at least three effective digital tool utilization strategies in a post-pandemic environment.
Participants can design human-centered pedagogical methods optimized for language learning using VR simulations.
Participants can propose measures to improve learner engagement by over 20% by applying project-based assessment methods.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
